mainEntity.name: Why does Largest Contentful Paint matter for crafts & diy stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) measures how long it takes for the largest visible element to load on your page. Google considers LCP a Core Web Vital, directly impacting your SEO rankings. Google recommends LCP under 2.5 seconds for a 'good' user experience, with anything over 4 seconds considered poor.

mainEntity.name: What is a good Largest Contentful Paint for Shopify crafts & diy stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Based on Boostra's analysis of 13 Shopify crafts & diy stores, the median largest contentful paint is 11.7s. Top-performing stores in this niche (top 10%) achieve 8.1s. Google recommends LCP under 2.5 seconds for a 'good' user experience, with anything over 4 seconds considered poor.

mainEntity.name: How can I improve my crafts & diy store's Largest Contentful Paint?

acceptedAnswer.text: Optimize and compress hero images using modern formats like WebP or AVIF. Implement lazy loading for below-the-fold images and defer non-critical JavaScript. Use a Content Delivery Network (CDN) to serve assets from edge locations closer to users. Preload critical resources and fonts to reduce render-blocking time.
